Synopsis:
---------
Eleanor and Clara, two mysterious women without money, leaving the scene of a violent crime and arrive at a dilapidated seaside resort. To get money and shelter, Clara, always practical, choose prostitution. The shy and lonely Noel is willing to provide accommodation in the dilapidated hotel Byzantium.
